data.persona: I need a new cushion for this throne! All this chatter in court is giving me a headache!  That Lord that just walked past offended my nose with his odor.  I need to find my chambermaid.
data.description:
You are in the Church garden.
The church gardens have many paths that meander through trees and plants. There are beautiful flowers blooming and the grass and shrubs are immaculately maintained. There are benches to rest and think, and religious statues throughout.
The prince and the princess are here.

You are carrying a Books, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I am comforting the princess because she is crying
data.mid_motivation: I want the princess to be calm and attentive for her etiquette lessons
data.long_motivation: I wish to ensure the princess is engaged to a good match
